mapper.select: SELECT Q.*,SHB.*,BM.BMNAME,BB.BBMC BBNAME,BB.QMBBID FROM (select distinct bbid as bbid1,bmcode as bmcode1 from jcpd_qdhfb) q LEFT JOIN JCPD_QDHFSHB SHB ON Q.BBID1=SHB.BBID AND Q.BMCODE1=SHB.BMCODE LEFT JOIN HTGL_BMB BM ON Q.BMCODE1=BM.BMCODE LEFT JOIN JCPD_BBKZB BB ON Q.BBID1=BB.BBID WHERE Q.BMCODE1=#{bmCode} ORDER BY Q.BBID1 DESC

select (case when cd=mileage then 1 else 0 end) from (select sum(cd) as cd from jcpd_qdhfb where bmCode=#{bmCode1} and bbid=#{bbid1}), (select sum(mileage)*1000 as mileage from htgl_ldb where bmcode=#{bmCode1})
select count(*) from jcpd_qdhfb where bmCode=#{bmCode} and bbid=#{bbid}
SELECT * FROM JCPD_QYHFB WHERE BBID=#{bbid} AND LXCODE=#{lxCode} AND SZHH>=#{szhh} AND #{ezhh}>SZHH
